verses.plain: I will praise thee with my whole heart: before the gods will I sing praise unto thee.

tokens.t: I will praise thee with my whole heart: before the gods will I sing praise unto thee.

verses.plain: I will worship toward thy holy temple, and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: for thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.

tokens.t: I will worship toward thy holy temple, and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: for thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.

verses.plain: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.

tokens.t: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me,

verses.plain: All the kings of the earth shall praise thee, O LORD, when they hear the words of thy mouth.

tokens.t: All the kings of the earth shall praise thee, O
, when they hear the words of thy mouth.

verses.plain: Yea, they shall sing in the ways of the LORD: for great is the glory of the LORD.

tokens.t: Yea, they shall sing in the ways of the

verses.plain: Though the LORD be high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.

tokens.t: high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.

verses.plain: Though I walk in the midst of trouble, thou wilt revive me: thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies, and thy right hand shall save me.

tokens.t: Though I walk in the midst of trouble, thou wilt revive me: thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies, and thy right hand shall save me.

verses.plain: The LORD will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O LORD, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.

tokens.t: for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
